/============================================= = = = Global Variables = = = = Contains all color definitions and basic = = variables that affect the entire website = ===============================================/

/* Color Palette / \(indigo-dye: #0A2A5E; /* Dark blue for headers */\)royal-blue: #1E50A0; / Royal blue for accents and hovers / \(lapis-lazuli: #3c6997ff; /* Secondary blue - hovers and accents */\)vivid-sky-blue: #5adbffff; / Bright blue - use sparingly for highlights */

/– scss:defaults –/ /* Basic Setup */ \(body-bg: #fafbfc;\)body-color: #2d3748;
\(link-color: #0A2A5E;\)font-family-sans-serif: “Source Sans Pro”, -apple-system, “system-ui”, “Segoe UI”, Roboto, “Helvetica Neue”, Arial, sans-serif; $font-size-root: 16px;

/– scss:rules –/

/* Root Variables - accessible throughout the site */ :root { –primary-color: #{\(indigo-dye}; --secondary-color: #{\)royal-blue};
–background-main: white;
–background-alt: #{\(body-bg}; --accent-1: #{\)body-color};
–accent-2: #{$lapis-lazuli};
}

&::after { content: ’‘; position: fixed; bottom: 15%; right: 10%; width: 100px; height: 75px; background-image: url(’logo.unfinished_nowhite- Copy.png’); background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; opacity: 0.12; filter: brightness(0) invert(1); animation: float 8s ease-in-out infinite reverse; z-index: 0; } }
